summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 123 m) and rainfall (down 1.4 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1709 m), rainfall (down 1.3 mm), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 123.0m lower than yesterday, 663.5m lower than the past week, 1709.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 944.0m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1607.5m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, humidity should not be a concern and calm and still conditions are expected. Showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dark. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
